Pokedex.name: Bulbasaur
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: A strange seed was planted on its back at birth. The plant sprouts and grows with this Pokémon.

Pokedex.name: Ivysaur
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: When the bulb on its back grows large, it appears to lose the ability to stand on its hind legs.

Pokedex.name: Venusaur
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: The plant blooms when the Pokémon is absorbing solar energy. It stays on the move to seek sunlight.

Pokedex.name: Charmander
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: From the time it is born, a flame burns at the tip of its tail. The flame is said to be a measure of its life.

Pokedex.name: Charmeleon
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: It has a barbaric nature. In battle, it whips its flaming tail around and slashes with sharp claws.

Pokedex.name: Charizard
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: It spits fire that is hot enough to melt boulders. It is known to cause forest fires unintentionally.

Pokedex.name: Squirtle
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: When it retracts its long neck into its shell, it squirts out water with vigorous force.

Pokedex.name: Wartortle
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: It is said to live 10,000 years. Its furry tail is a symbol of longevity and is popular as a gift to the elderly.

Pokedex.name: Blastoise
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: The jets of water that erupt from the cannons on its shell can punch holes through thick steel plate.

Pokedex.name: Caterpie
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: Its body is soft and weak. In order to protect itself, it emits a horrible stench from its antennae.

Pokedex.name: Metapod
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: It is waiting for the moment to evolve. At this stage, it can only harden, so it remains motionless to avoid attack.

Pokedex.name: Butterfree
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: In battle, it flaps its wings at great speed to release highly toxic dust into the air.

Pokedex.name: Weedle
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: Often found in forests and grasslands. It has a sharp, toxic barb of two inches on top of its head.

Pokedex.name: Kakuna
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: It remains virtually immobile as it awaits evolution. Attacked by predators, it may retaliate with a poisonous sting.

Pokedex.name: Beedrill
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: It flies at high speed and attacks with the large venomous stingers on its forelegs and tail.

Pokedex.name: Pidgey
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: Does not like to fight. It hides in tall grass and will kick up sand to protect itself.

Pokedex.name: Pidgeotto
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: This Pokémon flies around relentlessly, patrolling its large territory for any trespassers.

Pokedex.name: Pidgeot
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: By flapping its wings with great force, it can whip up a gusty wind capable of bending trees.

Pokedex.name: Rattata
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: Will chew on anything with its fangs. If you see one, you can be certain that 40 more are hidden nearby.

Pokedex.name: Raticate
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: Its fangs are always growing, so it must always be gnawing on something to keep them ground down.

Pokedex.name: Spearow
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: Eats bugs in grassy areas. It has to flap its small wings at high speed to stay airborne.

Pokedex.name: Fearow
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: A Pokémon that has been around for many ages. It has a long, thin beak and a long neck for catching prey.

Pokedex.name: Ekans
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: Moves silently and stealthily. Eats the eggs of birds, such as Pidgey and Spearow, whole.

Pokedex.name: Arbok
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: The frightening pattern on its belly is said to vary from area to area depending on its prey.

Pokedex.name: Pikachu
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: When several of these Pokémon gather, their electricity could build and cause lightning storms.

Pokedex.name: Raichu
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: Its tail discharges electricity into the ground, protecting itself from its own power.

Pokedex.name: Sandshrew
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: Its body is dry skin. When it curls up in a ball, it can withstand any attack.

Pokedex.name: Sandslash
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: The claws on its hands and feet are incredibly sharp. If it is enraged, it will shred its opponent with a flurry of attacks.

Pokedex.name: Nidoran♀
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: Although small, its horn is very poisonous. If it is excited, it will raise its ears and make a high-pitched cry.

Pokedex.name: Nidorina
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: The female's horn develops slowly. Prefers not to fight. It's said that this Pokémon becomes agitated if separated from its companions.

Pokedex.name: Nidoqueen
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: Its hard scales provide a rock-hard shield. It will protect its children from any danger.

Pokedex.name: Nidoran♂
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: The male has a horn that contains a powerful venom. Raising its ears is a sign of caution.

Pokedex.name: Nidorino
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: Its horn is harder than a diamond. If it is excited, the horn emits a powerful venom.

Pokedex.name: Nidoking
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: It swings its mighty tail in a destructive sweep, toppling opponents like trees.

Pokedex.name: Clefairy
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: Its adorable appearance is backed by its powerful psychic abilities. It is said to live at the foot of mountains.

Pokedex.name: Clefable
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: A timid fairy Pokémon that rarely appears before people. It will walk on water to return home under the moonlight.

Pokedex.name: Vulpix
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: At the time of birth, it has just one tail. The tail splits into six as it grows older.

Pokedex.name: Ninetales
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: Legend has it that nine noble saints were united and reincarnated as this Pokémon.

Pokedex.name: Jigglypuff
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: When its huge eyes waver, it is singing a lullaby. This song is sung so well, it is able to make any foe fall asleep.

Pokedex.name: Wigglytuff
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: Its fur is so soft, it is irresistible to touch. The softness is said to come from the fact that its fur is covered in a layer of fine, downy hair.

Pokedex.name: Zubat
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: Emits ultrasonic cries to check its surroundings. Even in crowded caves, Zubat will not bump into anything.

Pokedex.name: Golbat
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: It has a taste for the blood of living things. It will sometimes drink too much blood, making it too heavy to fly.

Pokedex.name: Oddish
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: During the day, it keeps its face buried in the ground. It is said to be a moon petal.

Pokedex.name: Gloom
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: The flower that blooms on its head is the largest in the world and smells awful.

Pokedex.name: Vileplume
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: The larger its petals, the more toxic pollen it contains. Its large flower is used to attract prey.

Pokedex.name: Paras
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: A host-parasite pair in which the bug is controlled by the mushrooms that grow on its back.

Pokedex.name: Parasect
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: A mushroom is growing out of its back. It is rumored to be the true brains of the Pokémon, controlling Parasect to scatter spores.

Pokedex.name: Venonat
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: Its big eyes are actually clusters of tiny eyes. At night, the eyes work like a radar system.

Pokedex.name: Venomoth
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: The powdery scales on its wings are hard to remove. They are laced with a venom that can paralyze foes.

Pokedex.name: Diglett
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: Lives about one yard underground where it feeds on plant roots. It sometimes appears on the surface.

Pokedex.name: Dugtrio
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: These triplets dig ground faster than a machine. They can create a major earthquake 60 miles beneath the surface.

Pokedex.name: Meowth
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: A nocturnal Pokémon that is able to see in the dark. It is attracted by shiny things.

Pokedex.name: Persian
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: A very proud Pokémon that will use its sharp claws to scratch its opponents without warning.

Pokedex.name: Psyduck
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: When its headache becomes severe, it starts using psychic power. However, it can't remember ever using it.

Pokedex.name: Golduck
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: A powerful swimmer, it can be seen fishing in rivers and lakes. Its psychic powers are amplified when swimming.

Pokedex.name: Mankey
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: If it starts shaking and its nasal breathing turns rough, it is about to enter a furious rage.

Pokedex.name: Primeape
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: It is always angry. If it stops being angry, it dies. Only by being angry can it stay alive.

Pokedex.name: Growlithe
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: Very protective of its territory. It will bark and bite to repel intruders from its space.

Pokedex.name: Arcanine
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: A legendary Pokémon in the East. Its speed is amazing. It is said to run over 6,200 miles in a single day and night.

Pokedex.name: Poliwag
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: Its skin is so thin, its internal organs are visible. It is a very timid Pokémon.

Pokedex.name: Poliwhirl
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: Its two legs are well developed. Even though it can live on the ground, it prefers to live in water.

Pokedex.name: Poliwrath
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: An adept swimmer. It can use its arms to break through ice blocks and swim at amazing speeds.

Pokedex.name: Abra
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: Abra sleeps for eighteen hours a day. However, it can sense the presence of foes even while it is sleeping. In such a situation, this Pokémon immediately teleports to safety.

Pokedex.name: Kadabra
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: It is rumored that a boy with psychic abilities suddenly transformed into Kadabra while assisting with research.

Pokedex.name: Alakazam
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: Its brain continually grows, infinitely multiplying brain cells. This amazing brain gives this Pokémon an astoundingly high IQ of 5,000. It uses its psychokinetic power to hold up its head.

Pokedex.name: Machop
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: Loves to build its muscles. It trains by lifting rocks around it. If it lifts a Geodude, it's a sure sign of strength.

Pokedex.name: Machoke
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: A very powerful Pokémon, it is capable of lifting a sumo wrestler with one hand. It wears a belt to control its power.

Pokedex.name: Machamp
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: Using its four arms, it can launch 1,000 punches in two seconds. It can even move mountains.

Pokedex.name: Bellsprout
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: A carnivorous Pokémon that plants its feet in the ground and uses its vine whips to catch unwary prey.

Pokedex.name: Weepinbell
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: It has a large hook on its rear end. The hook is used to anchor itself to the ground when it sleeps.

Pokedex.name: Victreebel
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: Lures prey with the sweet aroma of its flower, then swallows them whole. It's rumored to dissolve prey in a minute.

Pokedex.name: Tentacool
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: Drifts in shallow seas. Contact with its tentacles causes an agonizing sting.

Pokedex.name: Tentacruel
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: Its 80 tentacles can stretch out to ensnare its prey and inject venom. Its tentacles form a net to catch food.

Pokedex.name: Geodude
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: Found in fields and mountains. The deeper it lives, the more its body is polished by the wind and rain.

Pokedex.name: Graveler
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: Rolls down slopes to move. It's said to live in crevices on mountain cliffs. It often tumbles down steep paths.

Pokedex.name: Golem
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: Its body is a giant rock shell. It sheds its shell once a year. The shed shell quickly hardens, so it is often mistaken for a boulder.

Pokedex.name: Ponyta
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: Its mane is made of intense flames. It is capable of jumping over the Eiffel Tower in a single bound.

Pokedex.name: Rapidash
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: As it runs, it appears to be ablaze. With incredible speed, it can catch up to a bullet train.

Pokedex.name: Slowpoke
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: Incredibly slow and dim-witted. It takes 5 seconds for it to feel pain, even when bitten.

Pokedex.name: Slowbro
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: A Shellder that latched onto its tail has developed into a new species. The Shellder's bite activates its psychic powers.

Pokedex.name: Magnemite
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: The magnets at its sides generate an electromagnetic field that can neutralize enemy attacks.

evolution_chain.name: Magnezone
evolution_chain.method: Lvl Up in specific field/w Thunder Stone (later gens)

Pokedex.name: Magneton
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: A Magneton is two Magnemite joined together. A group of Magneton can generate powerful electromagnetic storms.

evolution_chain.name: Magnezone
evolution_chain.method: Lvl Up in specific field/w Thunder Stone (later gens)

Pokedex.name: Farfetch'd
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: The plant stalk it holds is both its weapon and its food. It is always seen with this plant, which it defends vigorously.

evolution_chain.name: Farfetch'd
evolution_chain.method: Does not evolve (Sirfetch'd in later gens)

Pokedex.name: Doduo
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: A two-headed Pokémon that was discovered in a grassy field. It runs at high speed by alternating its two feet.

Pokedex.name: Dodrio
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: Uses its three brains to plan. Each head represents a different emotion: joy, sorrow, and anger.

Pokedex.name: Seel
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: A Pokémon that lives on icebergs. It is a very good swimmer and is rarely seen on land.

Pokedex.name: Dewgong
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: Stores thermal energy in its body, allowing it to move freely in the coldest of seas. It loves to sleep on ice.

Pokedex.name: Grimer
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: Appears in dirty, neglected places. It likes to eat garbage and sludge. It multiplies when its sludge is broken apart.

Pokedex.name: Muk
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: A toxic sludge made of industrial waste. It smells horribly, but the stench is reduced by the time it reaches cities.

Pokedex.name: Shellder
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: Its shell is harder than a diamond. When attacking, it uses its sharp tongue to stab at opponents.

Pokedex.name: Cloyster
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: Its shell is covered in a layer of tough armor. It can fire sharp spikes from its core at high speeds.

Pokedex.name: Gastly
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: A Pokémon made of poison gas. It is said that when a person is in the dark, Gastly will appear and lick their face.

Pokedex.name: Haunter
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: Its tongue is made of gas. If licked, the victim starts shaking uncontrollably until death.

Pokedex.name: Gengar
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: Hides in the shadows. It is said to share its fate with the person whose shadow it has stolen.

Pokedex.name: Onix
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: As it digs, it swallows earth and boulders. This is why its body contains many hard minerals.

Pokedex.name: Drowzee
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: It can tell what people are dreaming by sniffing with its big nose. It eats dreams.

Pokedex.name: Hypno
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: It carries a pendulum that swings gently. Watching the pendulum can cause a person to fall asleep.

Pokedex.name: Krabby
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: Its hard shell is for protection. It can also use its massive claw to deliver crushing blows.

Pokedex.name: Kingler
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: One of its claws is gigantic. It is said that this massive claw can shatter rock, but Kingler cannot use it well in battle.

Pokedex.name: Voltorb
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: Usually found in power plants. They are often mistaken for Poké Balls and are known to explode when disturbed.

Pokedex.name: Electrode
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: The fastest Pokémon. The more energy it stores, the faster it moves. It can be a very dangerous sight in open fields.

Pokedex.name: Exeggcute
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: Its six eggs are said to be connected. If separated, they quickly gather and spin to get back together.

Pokedex.name: Exeggutor
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: Three heads that think independently. One head will wake up and start crying, causing the others to cry out as well.

Pokedex.name: Cubone
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: It wears the skull of its deceased mother. The skull is its helmet, which makes it feel safe.

Pokedex.name: Marowak
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: The bone it holds is its deceased mother's. It strikes with its bone like a boomerang.

Pokedex.name: Hitmonlee
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: Its legs freely contract and stretch. Using its legs, it can kick even the most distant foes.

Pokedex.name: Hitmonchan
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: Has the spirit of a boxer who trained for years. It punches at the speed of a bullet.

Pokedex.name: Lickitung
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: Its long tongue is always covered in a sticky saliva that never dries out. It can use its tongue to clean anything.

Pokedex.name: Koffing
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: A Pokémon that is composed of poison gas. It is said to have been created in a chemical reaction.

Pokedex.name: Weezing
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: When it inhales, it takes in poisonous fumes. When it exhales, it releases a cloud of toxins that can clear a room.

Pokedex.name: Rhyhorn
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: Its horn is hard enough to crush a diamond. It is known to run through anything it sees.

Pokedex.name: Rhydon
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: The horn on its head can rotate like a drill and shatter diamonds. It is protected by an incredibly thick hide.

Pokedex.name: Chansey
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: A rare and tenderhearted Pokémon that shares its highly nutritious eggs with injured people.

Pokedex.name: Tangela
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: Its body is shrouded in blue vines. Nobody has ever seen its face or its body underneath the vines.

evolution_chain.name: Tangrowth
evolution_chain.method: Lvl Up w/ Ancient Power (later gens)

Pokedex.name: Kangaskhan
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: If it senses danger to its baby, it will attack without hesitation. It rarely lets the baby out of its pouch.

Pokedex.name: Horsea
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: Known to shoot ink from its mouth. It is a very playful Pokémon that lives in coral reefs.

Pokedex.name: Seadra
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: The male is said to be the one who takes care of the offspring. It uses its venomous spikes in battle.

Pokedex.name: Goldeen
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: In the spring, these Pokémon travel up rivers to lay their eggs. It can swim at a high speed with its pectoral fins.

Pokedex.name: Seaking
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: The male of the species is the first to begin the mating dance. It uses its large horn to bore holes in river rocks for its nest.

Pokedex.name: Staryu
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: If the core is glowing, it means that the Pokémon is healthy. It communicates with others by blinking its core.

Pokedex.name: Starmie
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: Its core shines with the seven colors of the rainbow. It is believed that it sends electric waves into outer space.

Pokedex.name: Mr. Mime
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: Its pantomime is so realistic that the audience members can see the invisible walls it creates.

Pokedex.name: Scyther
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: Strikes with its twin scythes. If it attacks in a flash, it can slash its foes before they even realize they've been cut.

Pokedex.name: Jynx
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: A Pokémon that seems to be dancing while walking. It uses a human-like speech, which sounds like humming.

Pokedex.name: Electabuzz
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: Feeds on electricity. It can be found near power plants, where it uses the electricity to power up its body.

Pokedex.name: Magmar
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: Born in volcanic craters. Its body temperature is 2,200 degrees Fahrenheit, allowing it to move freely in lava.

Pokedex.name: Pinsir
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: Grasps its foe with its pincers and then crushes them. Its pincers are said to have the strength of 10,000 pounds.

Pokedex.name: Tauros
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: Once it targets its prey, it charges tirelessly. It is known for its uncontrollable wild nature.

Pokedex.name: Magikarp
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: Known for being useless, it is nevertheless a very common Pokémon. It can leap high out of the water.

Pokedex.name: Gyarados
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: In ancient times, this Pokémon was feared for its destructive rages. It can destroy cities in a single fit of anger.

Pokedex.name: Lapras
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: Its smooth skin and large fins allow it to travel quickly through the water. It is capable of understanding human speech.

Pokedex.name: Ditto
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: Can instantly transform itself into an exact duplicate of any object or Pokémon it sees.

Pokedex.name: Eevee
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: A rare Pokémon that adapts to its surroundings by changing its shape and abilities. It is said to have unstable genes.

evolution_chain.name: Leafeon
evolution_chain.method: Lvl Up near Moss Rock (later gens)

evolution_chain.name: Glaceon
evolution_chain.method: Lvl Up near Ice Rock (later gens)

evolution_chain.name: Sylveon
evolution_chain.method: Lvl Up w/ Fairy move + 2 Affection (later gens)

Pokedex.name: Vaporeon
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: A Pokémon that lives in water. Its cells are structured to resemble water molecules, allowing it to melt into the water.

Pokedex.name: Jolteon
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: If it is angry or startled, the hairs on its body stand on end and it fires off a barrage of electric needles.

Pokedex.name: Flareon
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: A Pokémon with a beautiful tail, it stores heat in its body and releases it at temperatures of 1,650 degrees Fahrenheit.

Pokedex.name: Porygon
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: A Pokémon that was created using computer code. It can freely move in cyberspace.

Pokedex.name: Omanyte
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: An ancient Pokémon resurrected from a Fossil. It uses its tentacles to catch prey in the water.

Pokedex.name: Omastar
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: Its heavy shell makes it difficult to move. It is said to have become extinct because its shell became too heavy.

Pokedex.name: Kabuto
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: A Pokémon resurrected from a Fossil. It lived on the seabed and hid under its shell when attacked.

Pokedex.name: Kabutops
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: In ancient times, it swam in the sea and sliced its victims with its long, sharp scythes.

Pokedex.name: Aerodactyl
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: A ferocious, prehistoric Pokémon that goes for the enemy's throat with its serrated saw-like fangs. It was resurrected using DNA taken from amber.

Pokedex.name: Snorlax
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: Will eat almost anything, even moldy food. It wakes up only to eat and rarely moves after eating.

Pokedex.name: Articuno
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: A legendary bird Pokémon. It causes snow to fall on the mountains, and its magnificent tail feathers flutter gracefully.

Pokedex.name: Zapdos
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: A legendary bird Pokémon that is said to live in thunderclouds. It gains power when struck by lightning.

Pokedex.name: Moltres
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: A legendary bird Pokémon. Every time it flaps its wings, it is said to create a dazzling flash of flames.

Pokedex.name: Dratini
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: A rare Pokémon that has been sighted in lakes and rivers. It is said to be a mythical Pokémon from the sea.

Pokedex.name: Dragonair
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: It is said to live at the bottom of the sea. It has a mystical power to change the weather.

Pokedex.name: Dragonite
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: It is said to make its home somewhere in the sea. It is a kindhearted Pokémon that rescues people from drowning.

Pokedex.name: Mewtwo
Pokedex.pokedex_entry: A Pokémon whose genetic code was repeatedly recombined for research. It is said to have the most savage heart among all Pokémon.
